title: Epistemological Approaches to Overcoming Learning Difficulties: Constructivist-Based Mathematics Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Utilization of Smartphone-Based Learning Management System (LMS) with Supplementary Offline Worksheets

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least three contradictions between their daily experiences and mathematical concepts
Learners can explain abstract mathematical concepts by mapping them to concrete cases using a constructivist approach
Learners can recognize limitations of prior knowledge through formative assessments and derive at least two alternative cognitive strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
